title:
Jim,

Good afternoon.

Can you tell us how much the below teams pay the city of Wilmingon to use Legion Stadium or Buck Hardee field for events?

Sharks,Hammerheads,Wilmington Tigers?

Per event?

Thanks,Chuck Kuebler
text:
Chuck,



I'm forwarding your questions to Dan Spears, the sports editor.
He's handling all questions related to the stadium.
